name: Left stick to move
description:
In Left stick to move you have to work together to defeat the evil space skeleton. You have only one problem, Only one player can move at a time.  Work together by moving or not moving when the other needs to. 

Controls: left stick to move

This game needs 2 controllers to be playable. 

Made by: Aran & Riemer
Special thanks: Piem & Vince
